nodes.speaker: Fence
nodes.text: So, you want to get into the city? The guards are checking everyone. You'll need a pass.

nodes.speaker: Fence
nodes.text: I have the blank papers and the seals. But my hands... they shake too much these days. You do it.

choices.text: What do I need to do?

nodes.speaker: Fence
nodes.text: Listen carefully. Today is the Emperor's birthday. The guards will only accept passes with the 'Red Phoenix' seal. Anything else will get you arrested.

set.currentObjective: Forge a pass at the Forgery table.
